name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Miguel Angel PADILLA. Appeal of Government of Mexico

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Miguel Angel PADILLA Appeal of Government of Mexico.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 9th day of October, 2008, the Government of Mexico’s Notice of Appeal is QUASHED, and the Commonwealth’s “Motion to Quash the Appeal Filed By Counsel Who Are Not of Record” is DENIED AS MOOT.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
958 A.2d 1038
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Miguel Angel PADILLA Appeal of Government of Mexico.
No. 569 CAP.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Oct. 9, 2008.
